Class Clients

    Class that keeps track of all registered clients

      • getRegisteredClient

        public Client getRegisteredClient(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Get the client that is linked to the given username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - Username
        password - Entered password, used for checking with stored hashed password
        Returns:
        Client if username and password are correct. Null otherwise
